billEvents.eventText: referred to consumer affairs and protection

title: Requires a car dealer to notify the consumer as to whether the vehicle to be purchased was manufactured for introduction into the American market or into a foreign market
summary: Requires a car dealer to notify the consumer as to whether the vehicle to be purchased was manufactured for introduction into the American market or into a foreign market.
actClause: AN ACT to amend the general business law, in relation to requiring the disclosure of the market for which a vehicle was manufactured
